attributes.review: Downloaded the app due to curiosity, but then some crazy sh*t happened. First it turned of dark mode, I thought it was just a glitch, but then everything turned white. And then my social media got hacked and started posting white power post. I was mortified and when I tried to clear things up it just posted different YouTubersâ€™ and tiktokersâ€™ apologies for saying the n word and black face. LOTS of Shane Dawson posts. Now all these yeeyees keep following me and Iâ€™ve lost so many friends. Itâ€™s been devastating to think people believe Iâ€™m a racist. Thatâ€™s what I get for downloading the most racist app available. You have been warned!

attributes.title: fake news

attributes.review:
I logged into the app to be met with an orange man covering my whole entire screen and telling me how only white Americans deserve to be here. Wow. And then when I tried logging out I had like Cheeto flakes all over my phone on my screen quite weird if you ask me. Then all of a sudden I was just you know vibing through tiktok and all of sudden my screen turned off and turned Cheeto dust orange and MAGA appeared on my screen. I was very terrified and donâ€™t use the app while listening to music. I REPEAT DO NOT USE APP WHILE LISTENING TO MUSIC! It blocked out all my music and instead played this song that goes Donald Trump is our guy. Vote for him and donâ€™t be shy. i- 
I was at lost for words. And I was trying to just vibe to dixie damelios new song. Plus it changed my lock screen to a chopstick with a big hoody on him. By the name lil buddy and I couldnâ€™t change it. I was very concerned for my phone and myself. My mental health was compromise because of this experience. I do not recommend unless you feel like having nightmares of a Cheeto dust president who is breaking his sons heart everyday. #savebarronbtw #cheetoinfected #streambehappy #damelios2020?
